resources.string: Enter the e-mail address linked to your address below. We will send you an e-mail to reset your password.
What are you interested in today? Right down as many tag words as you want, they can be modified later in your settings
Tags are important: as soon as some posts an item with one of your tags, you will receive an immediate notification
Has someone shared their username hashtag with you? You can enter it here or any subject you’re interested in. You can also skip this step for now and Finalize Registration.
What do you want to do now?

Welcome to your Private Jet Locator app. Thank you for trying out this innovative app, the first ever map where the information is not centrally moderated and always up-to-date. Your current position is the BLUE dot.
Transparent aircraft icons are EMPTY LEGS; full aircraft icons are regular charters; parked aircraft are indicated by the letter “P”.

Empty Legs can get cancelled or modified to adapt to the main customer’s schedule or requirements so we’ve decided to post them not more than 48 hours in advance to mitigate this risk. After 24 hours, the timer is reset for another 24 hours. On the day of the flight, the aircraft disappears from the map.
Parked Aircraft remain on the map for as long as they are parked: the end date is set by the operator.

Click on any icon to discover when and where the aircraft is set to go. Parked aircraft are “just sitting there” so you can interact with the operator to find out if that particular aircraft can go in another direction than the one suggested on the post.
Posts are designed to be interactive: click on the HEART icon to follow a particular flight. Following a flight means you’ll receive updates on that flight.

Click on the BUBBLE icon to ask questions, post comments or suggestions and even propose to share the flight. When you leave a message on the flight’s post, the icon of that flight starts blinking so other users know it’s a “hot” flight.
Click on the SHARE icon to send the information on the flight to your friends.
By clicking on BOOK, you automatically send us a WhatsApp message: booking or inquiring has never been easier. ENJOY!
Do you want to suggest another price? Do you want to share this flight with other users? Use this box to leave your suggestions/comments.
You have entered Guest Mode; in order to access all the Social Network Features, you must create an account.
We\'ve started a crowdfunding campaign to bring new functionalities to this app. A $10 support would go a long way. More information here:

Sustainable Aviation Fuel (SAF) is a “drop-in” fuel that meets all the same technical and safety requirements as fossil-based jet fuel. SAF contains the same hydrocarbons (and thus the same tailpipe emissions) as fossil-based kerosene, but the difference is that the hydrocarbons came from a more sustainable source. This results in a net reduction of emissions when comparing to fossil jet fuel on a life cycle basis.
